Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the movie *CODA*?
Options:
A. a) Emilia Jones plays the character Ruby Rossi.
B. b) Ruby Rossi has interactions with Eugenio Derbez's character.
C. c) Eugenio Derbez plays Ruby Rossi's father.
D. d) All of the above
Answer:
a) Emilia Jones plays the character Ruby Rossi. 
b) Ruby Rossi has interactions with Eugenio Derbez's character.
